entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 30 March 2023
